title: Workshop on Developing Volleyball Coaching Strategies Using a Constraints-Led Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Theory of Physical Education, Understanding Basic Volleyball Rules
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented training focused on developing data-driven strategies for pre-service teachers to apply in real coaching settings

learning_goals: Learners can design learning tasks reflecting actual game situations by utilizing performance analytics data
Coaching strategies can be developed to enhance athletes' problem-solving abilities and functional coordination skills through constraint manipulation
A representative learning environment (task representativeness) can be implemented based on analysis of the opposing team's characteristics
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
